name: Save the default value data if any was specified.
Protect jorm database related files by crypting them with a secret key or by any other mean.
Implement the possibility for users to submit data omitting no required fields
description: Ex : If [ user ] has got two fieds [ username ] and [ age ]. The first one is required but not the second one. The user can only submit data with [ username ] value and omit the age one which will receive either the defaulValue either null.
